38.eng-name: Chapters on the description of Paradise
38.ara-name: كتاب صفة الجنة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ali narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"Indeed in Paradise there is a gathering for Al-Hur Al-'Ein wherein they rasie their voices. The creatures have not heard the likes of them." [He said:] "They say: 'We are the eternal ones, we shall not die. We are the ones who live in joy and comfort, we have no needs. We are the pleased ones, we do not get angry. Tuba(good news) to the one who belongs to us and we to him.'" Other chains report similar narrations

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَلاَمِ الْحُورِ الْعِينِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About the Speech of Al-Hur Al-Ein
